data.title: Trae - Ship Faster with Trae
data.description: Trae is an adaptive AI IDE that transforms how you work, collaborating with you to run faster.
data.content:
Trae - Ship Faster with Trae
===============
    

[](https://www.trae.ai/home)[Docs](https://docs.trae.ai/)[Community](https://discord.gg/NV3MF24tAe)

[Log in](https://www.trae.ai/login?redirect_url=https://www.trae.ai/download)Download

[](https://www.trae.ai/home)

[⚡️ Claude 3.7 Sonnet is available now! ↗](https://www.trae.ai/download)

Ship Faster with Trae

Trae is an adaptive AI IDE that transforms how you work, collaborating with you to run faster.

Download Trae

[See all download options](https://www.trae.ai/download)

Collaboration = You & Trae

Trae is your ideal development partner, seamlessly balancing human & AI capabilities. This dynamic collaboration ensures each task is handled by the most suitable agent, maximizing your productivity. 

\# Builder

Chat to build a project faster

In Builder mode, Trae automatically breaks down and executes tasks, optimizing each step while letting you preview and control the process.

Your browser does not support HTML5 video tags.

\# Multimodality

Upload images to clarify requirements

With advanced multimodal capabilities, Trae understands your image uploads with precision, streamlining collaboration and boosting efficiency.

Your browser does not support HTML5 video tags.

\# Context

Get better results with full context

Trae is designed to analyze your entire codebase, utilizing insights from your editor and terminal to understand your workflow better. This enables more precise code generation and tailored modifications to meet your specific needs.

Workspace

Folder

Files

Code

···

Your browser does not support HTML5 video tags.

\# Autocomplete

Boost efficiency with smart completion

Trae can seamlessly extend your code in real-time, intuitively predict your intended edits, and automatically apply the changes for you.

Your browser does not support HTML5 video tags.

Loved by Devs

Trae is popular among developers worldwide.

![Image 1: Md. Shah Paran](https://www.trae.ai/)

Md. Shah Paran

Trae’s seamless experience and intuitive design make it my top pick for creative projects. It’s a game changer that continuously boosts my productivity—highly recommended!

![Image 2: Steve Morin](https://www.trae.ai/)

Steve Morin

Love how Trae accelerates my development and that of my teams.

![Image 3: Aldino Kemal](https://www.trae.ai/)

Aldino Kemal

TRAE, the real AI partner! It’s been such a huge help in getting my tasks done—no stress coding at all. Plus, I’ve got to say, this is the best code editor UI I’ve ever used!

![Image 4: Alex](https://www.trae.ai/)

Alex

I just built a RAG app in under 30min using https://trae.ai and I did not write a single character of code.

![Image 5: Carlos Nexans](https://www.trae.ai/)

Carlos Nexans

@trae\_ai is definitely a game changer. It feels like you have a real assistant that does the heavy lifting for you. The UI stands out among other IDEs.

![Image 6: MathiasClari](https://www.trae.ai/)

MathiasClari

I can’t imagine a day without@trae\_ai! Its adaptive AI features have become essential to my coding routine, making development faster and more intuitive. Kudos to the team for this incredible tool!

![Image 7: AlexS](https://www.trae.ai/)

AlexS

I'm experimenting with AI tools. I've built a full-fledged application in two weeks. I know there are tools that can build it with a prompt, but doing it incrementally feels more satisfying. @Trae\_ai

![Image 8: Ast JXS](https://www.trae.ai/)

Ast JXS

Tested multiple AI coding platforms and I have to say @Trae\_ai has surpassed them all. Massive applause and respect for the effort!

![Image 9: Miracleio✨](https://www.trae.ai/)

Miracleio✨

@Trae\_ai is the most beautiful code editor I've ever used. And it works as well as it looks. It's by far my best VSCode replacement right now.

![Image 10: 0xKerryu](https://www.trae.ai/)

0xKerryu

I am impressed with @Trae\_ai . I’ve used competitors for a while now, I can confidently say Trae is my new favorite daily driver. Not only is it quick, it’s stylish! I love the way it looks, refreshing to work in and extremely responsive.

Trae is hands down my favorite AI IDE—smarter, sleeker, and outpacing Cursor and Windsurf every time. Just waiting on those model settings for new and local models to unlock its full potential. Ps: Love the UI/UX

![Image 22: Nikita Kakuev](https://www.trae.ai/)

Nikita Kakuev

You know what, @Trae\_ai is my best mate now! He's teaching me Rust and it's the best experience I've had so far with AIs!

![Image 23: György Márk Varga](https://www.trae.ai/)

György Márk Varga

I've been using @Trae\_ai code edit since they launched. Wow, they have one of the greatest developer experience amongst IDEs and the productivity gain from the Builder mode really making me a 10x engineer. Great product.

![Image 24: Vincent DELBEAU](https://www.trae.ai/)

Vincent DELBEAU

Trae is an AI-powered code editor that stands out for its pleasant interface and responsive features. The Builder mode enables efficient development of complete projects.

Colin

Trae enhances coding efficiency with smart autocompletion, making development faster and smoother!

Trae is so freaking amazing that I'm starting to worry my job's gonna vanish into thin air.
